item.title: OPTICAL CABLE CORP 10-K
item.description: OPTICAL CABLE CORP, which is in the Drawing And Insulating Nonferrous Wire [3357] industry, SEC 10-K filing on December 22, 2022 had 6357 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 96 instances fiber - 88 instances cable - 78 instances optic - 76 instances 10 - 65 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
